WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 19 APR
   BY M/V BGP PIONEER TOWING 12000 METER LONG
   CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   28-29.04S 047-30.13W, 29-32.11S 046-04.72W,
   28-44.06S 045-20.42W, 27-43.31S 046-39.53W,
   27-46.20S 046-42.37W, 27-48.35S 047-22.39W,
   28-25.23S 047-25.49W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 20 APR 21.
